articles.title: Payton Pritchard scores 24 points, Celtics roll past Grizzlies 131-95
articles.description:
The Grizzlies played without Ja Morant, the star guard who sat out because of a right ankle injury sustained Tuesday night in a loss at New York.

articles.title: Chaim Bloom reflects on Mookie Betts trade more than 5 years later
articles.description:

articles.title: Julian Edelman mentions Bill Belichick as a potential fit for Giants coaching job

articles.title: Revolution chart a new course with the intriguing head coach selection of Marko Mitrović
articles.description:

articles.title: Mike Vrabel, Drake Maye say Patriots aren’t taking Jets matchup lightly
articles.description:
